socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Acid ceramidase deficiency: Farber disease and SMA-PME

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative disease overview and symptom impact
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: ASAH1-Related Disorders - Symptoms, Causes, Treatment

justification: No quantitative cost-of-illness studies were identified for Farber disease; the available evidence is limited to qualitative descriptions of severe clinical burden from peer-reviewed and patient-organisation sources.
